Kirby.Title: Kirby
Kirby.Description: Riding in on the spring breeze, it's Kirby! Inhale enemies and copy their powers. A galaxy stretches beyond your wildest dreams, so it's time to get going!

Gamble.Title: Gamble
Gamble.Description: This new friend from outer space came to Popstar to ask Kirby for a hand in defeating the Cosmic Fluxbender! Gamble wields dice, cards, roulettes, and magical energy to take down the enemy. Make them fold!

Meta Knight.Title: Meta Knight
Meta Knight.Description: The mysterious masked knight from Kirby's Adventure is here! He is chivalrous and always willing to fight any source of evil. All of Dream Land fears his sword!

Helper.Title: Helper
Helper.Description: Folks from all over have come together to help Kirby on his adventure! Play as a plethora of creatures from across Gamble Galaxy, from stubby Waddle Dees to invincible Gordos!

Gooey.Title: Gooey
Gooey.Description: While of strange origin, Gooey has a heart of gold, always eager to show up by his friends. With his ridiculously long tongue, he's happy to help Kirby along his adventure!

Magolor.Title: Magolor
Magolor.Description: 'Flux? I'll show you real power!' This tricky wizard hails from Kirby's Return to Dream Land. He used to be a lying cheat, but he's reformed... right? His otherworldly magic will make short work of your enemies!

Keeby.Title: Keeby
Keeby.Description: While not as adventurous as his friendly rival, Keeby seemed eager to join him on his quest! Can he take a little break from his golfing career?

Cutter.Title: Cutter
Cutter.Description: Wield a sharp boomerang to slash and dash through enemies!

Beam.Title: Beam
Beam.Description: Conjure up rays of electricity to flail around. Charge up to shoot from a distance!

Mystic Beam.Title: Mystic Beam
Mystic Beam.Description: The power of flux has turned our Beam into Mystic Beam! The beam shield doubles as an attack!

Stone.Title: Stone
Stone.Description: Turn into a rock and become impenetrable! What are these strange statues?

Ufo.Title: Ufo
Ufo.Description: Transform into an alien ship and blast enemies with lasers, pew pew!

Mirror.Title: Mirror
Mirror.Description: Use the power of reflection to send enemy attacks right back at them!

Ninja.Title: Ninja
Ninja.Description: Become an assassin of shadows and strike sneakily!

Bomb.Title: Bomb
Bomb.Description: Grab a bomb and throw it, but don't hold on too long!

Fire.Title: Fire
Fire.Description: Burn up the competition with powerful flames, yowch!

Mystic Fire.Title: Mystic Fire
Mystic Fire.Description: The power of flux has made your Fire stronger! No need to aim anymore, so burn your foes to the ground!

Ice.Title: Ice
Ice.Description: Skate around and freeze foes with your cold breath!

Spark.Title: Spark
Spark.Description: Mash the directional keys to charge up and zap enemies!

Yoyo.Title: Yoyo
Yoyo.Description: Slide into action and wave a yoyo with stylish power!

Wheel.Title: Wheel
Wheel.Description: Speed through crowds of enemies all while being nearly invincible, vroom vroom!

Artist.Title: Artist
Artist.Description: Slap opponents with your brush or paint up an army of drawngs to fight alongside you!

Fighter.Title: Fighter
Fighter.Description: Turn into a master martial artist and KO your opponents. Ka-pow!

Suplex.Title: Suplex
Suplex.Description: Channel the wrestler spirit by grappling enemies and throwing them around!

Wing.Title: Wing
Wing.Description: Fly through the skies with grace. Dash into enemies or send volleys of feathers at them!

Jet.Title: Jet
Jet.Description: Charge the engine to zoom forward at supersonic speeds!

Sword.Title: Sword
Sword.Description: Wield a sharp blade to slice and stab all sorts of things!

Parasol.Title: Parasol
Parasol.Description: Protect yourself from falling objects, whack enemies, and even fall slowly!

Hammer.Title: Hammer
Hammer.Description: Smash enemies with extremely powerful swings of a hammer, ouch!

Bell.Title: Bell
Bell.Description: Ring ring! Dual wield these loud instruments to compose a destructive song!

Water.Title: Water
Water.Description: Bend water to your will to power wash enemies. Surf's up!

Hi-Jump.Title: Hi-Jump
Hi-Jump.Description: Leap into the air with a Hi-Jump! Zoom back down with an unstoppable Rocket Dive!

Gear.Title: Gear
Gear.Description: Throw wrenches at your enemies and make wacky constructions. Sentry up!

Scan.Title: Scan
Scan.Description: Use an advanced headset to scan and copy foes abilities!

Crash.Title: Crash
Crash.Description: Clear the whole screen with a single mighty boom!

Mic.Title: Mic
Mic.Description: Use your powerful singing skill to defeat all the enemies around you! CHESTO!

Ultra Sword.Title: Ultra Sword
Ultra Sword.Description: This huge sword can devastate enemies and your terrain with pure destructive power! Slice and dice!

Waddle Dee.Title: Waddle Dee
Waddle Dee.Description: Everyone's favorite!  Generally easygoing, they'll be a common sight throughout almost any adventure!  They don't tend to be malicious under any circumstances, they just go with the flow and play around with whatever's in their nearby environment.  The jury's out on what those 'Wanya' noises mean, but they're certainly adorable!

Waddle Doo.Title: Waddle Doo
Waddle Doo.Description: This one-eyed wonder prides himself on both the reliability of the beam he shoots from his eye, and his attendance record that's nearly as good as his Waddle Dee 'cousins.'  Nobody knows the true relationship between the two races, but they get along famously well.  Waddle Doos are even known to be protective of Waddle Dees.  How sweet!

Bronto Burt.Title: Bronto Burt
Bronto Burt.Description: The flying guy with a name that's fun to say, that's Bronto Burt!  Not only are they known for flying, the patterns in which they do so are some of the most varied of any aerial denizen.  While rare, Bronto Burt HAS been known to waddle around on the ground.  It's considered lucky if you see one doing this; lucky, and very adorable.

Twizzy.Title: Twizzy
Twizzy.Description: This darn canary sure likes to fly!  On top of flying, her hobbies include hopping around and spending time with Tookey.  It's probably pretty obvious, but Twizzy is in fact a little Tookey.  More accurately, she's the immature stage in a Tookey's life cycle; freshly Hatched Chicks tend to be even smaller.  She's in your way, but she's still just a kid, so go easy on her.

Tookey.Title: Tookey
Tookey.Description: It's a chicken I tells ya, a giant chicken!  And this giant chicken is...  actually not too threatening.  Though, she DOES have a bit more experience than her junior Twizzys.  Don't expect her flight patterns to be quite as predictable as theirs.  Actually, she seems pretty protective of them.  I wonder if all Tookeys have that parental instinct...

Gordo.Title: Gordo
Gordo.Description: The original invulnerable foe with...  oddly soothing eyes.  Gordos always seem to be in the way, either stationary, moving along a path, or even used as ammo by other creatures!  Nothing hurts them, so they don't seem to mind.  They really don't seem to mean any harm, but they don't need to eat or sleep either.  They 'don't' anything, so it's hard to really...  like them?  Just avoid them.

Blood Gordo.Title: Blood Gordo
Blood Gordo.Description: Trading the trademark soft eyes of their cousins for a striking red flair, these living hazards give the term 'menacing aura' a new meaning!  They rarely seem to venture outside said aura's radius, so perhaps they're more territorial than they are malicious, but a Gordo's a Gordo; AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Mystic Doo.Title: Mystic Doo
Mystic Doo.Description: A Waddle Doo whose physical form has been horribly corrupted by a mysterious substance Gamble describes as 'Flux'. Apparently Flux is powerful enough to alter the DNA of anything it contacts, as evidenced by Mystic Doo's melting, horned form. Thanks to the Flux, Mystic Doo has gained the ability to float and summon shields of electric beams! I sure hope there's a way to restore poor Waddle Doo's regular form...

Bouncy.Title: Bouncy
Bouncy.Description: This little lady loves nothing more than hopping.  And jumping.  Leaping, even.  There have to be other words for that, right?  Anyway, Bouncy doesn't care if it's in place or in a straight line, if she can bound around, she's happy.  She used to go by Bouncy Ty, but nobody knew what 'Ty' meant, so she dropped it.  Rumor has it she has an old rivalry with Starman...

Cappy.Title: Cappy
Cappy.Description: These fashion-forward fellows love to hop around showing off their striking caps.  Speaking of, some of them are so eager to show off that they'll throw it straight up so you can get a better view!  Perhaps that's why if you destroy their caps, they get so panicked, they're just upset.  By the way, they're closer to living clay dolls than mushrooms.  Isn't that weird?

Broom Hatter.Title: Broom Hatter
Broom Hatter.Description: Broom Hatter's eternal mission to clean the world has taken them across and beyond Planet Pop Star, with no sign of stopping!  Whether or not Kirby can copy their ability varies from day to day, but they've been known to periodically provide the Cleaning ability.  Little-known fact: they excel at finding some of the most remote and secret locations in the galaxy.

Coconut.Title: Coconut
Coconut.Description: BAHAHAHAHA, HE GOT HIT IN THE HEAD WITH A COCONUT!  While some coconuts are edible and nutritious, these are NOT that.  In fact, they've been known to literally explode.  It's thought that their insides are filled with a substance similar to gunpowder.  Any rumors that the universe will collapse if these go extinct are fabrications.

Noddy.Title: Noddy
Noddy.Description: Too tired to write this description...maybe...later...yawwwn...

Blado.Title: Blado
Blado.Description: Blado looks angry because it's sick and tired of just being considered a 'bladed Gordo.'  It has dreams, aspirations; it believes it can be more than just a pretty-yet-angry face, chained to a specific location and treading the same rut day in and out... but it never seems to take the initiative, instead seething in its designated path and slicing anything that comes near.

Grizzo.Title: Grizzo
Grizzo.Description: BIG.  FLOOF.  Grizzo's a big, lovable fuzzball.  He's a healthy guy too, able to take a lot of punishment.  Still, he's content to sleep or just trundle around.  I'd say not to worry when you see him charge at you, but with that weight, it's gonna hurt!  He's just being friendly though, the angry eyes are from exertion, not malice.  He's actually so friendly, he's been known to let Poppy Bros. Jr ride on his back!

Glunk.Title: Glunk
Glunk.Description: The original, bonafide enemy anemone.  Well, that's what we think it is, anyway. For some reason, Glunk is known to somehow survive on dry land. While said dry land is often near water, Glunk seems to have no problem with it, even sometimes clinging to the dry ground or ceiling. If it's truly aquatic, perhaps it absorbs water vapor in the air?...

Burning Leo.Title: Burning Leo
Burning Leo.Description: This high-strung hothead (not to be confused with Hothead) is known for two things: breathing fire and his amazing hair.  He can often be found protectively clutching his glorious mane.  Actually, speaking of Hothead, Burning Leo gets along with him surprisingly well, and is always willing to share pyrotechnical pointers to the less experienced firestarter.

Tomatoo.Title: Tomatoo
Tomatoo.Description: Yolk Yard's resident jumping champion.  Leave him alone long enough and he'll show you why he has that title!  Just make sure you're aware of where he plans to land.  Naturally, he's quite tasty, especially to a tomato-lover such as Kirby; rumor has it that eating Tomatoos can even extend one's life!

Onion.Title: 'Onion'
Onion.Description: A funny little fellow that calls Yolk Yard his home.  After uprooting himself as he reaches maturity, he loves nothing more than to show intruders the business end of... himself.  Self-preservation doesn't seem to be much of a concern...  What?  A 'carrot'?  What planet are YOU living on?

Anemonee.Title: Anemonee
Anemonee.Description: Wow, look who it is!  You might be led to believe that Yin-Yarn invented this enemy on his own, but no, this is the genuine article on which his yarn copies were based!  Be careful when you're swimming; get tangled in this hungry fellow's tentacles and you only have a few moments to escape before Anemonee gets his lunch!...  That would be you.

Gim.Title: Gim
Gim.Description: This hip looking guy loves to play around with his iconic yo-yo, he can do all kinds of sweet tricks with it, including his Break-Spin move! Though watch out for his moves, ‘cause if he hits you, it really, REALLY hurts; his fans could tell you from experience. Also check out those sweet sneakers! Gim really knows how to look cool, maybe that's why he's been absent from Kirby's journeys for so long, he's too cool-looking and ends up distracting everybody.

Bobo.Title: Bobo
Bobo.Description: Big Bobos become Boboos, but big Boboo Bobos became bizarre.  In other words, Boboos are quite rare in spite of the shapes and sizes Bobos have been known to come in; while Bobos are made of ACTUAL FIRE, they rarely do more than toddle around, making them easy targets.  They're surprisingly good at not setting things on fire by accident, however.

Foley.Title: Foley
Foley.Description: A weirdo.  Seriously, he drops himself from his propeller stem and HIS HEAD EXPLODES!  But here's a secret; you see how his stem flies away?  All it needs to do is find some nice soil and replant itself, then Foley can grow anew!  As for why he does this in the first place, what you don't know won't hurt you...  Unless he decides to fall on you.  That'd hurt.  A lot.

Como.Title: Como
Como.Description: Como looks like a spider, but he only has six legs, so he's more of a spider-like insect.  On principle, this doesn't bother Como too much, but his legs aren't very suited for moving around.  He secretly wishes he had one more pair of legs that would let him mobilize for a grand adventure!...  Maybe someday, Como.  Maybe someday...

Cairn.Title: Cairn
Cairn.Description: A man-made pile (or stack) of stones raised for a purpose, usually as a marker or as a burial mound... wait, wrong entry.  Though, it IS still a pile of stones.  It's currently unknown whether the small stone at the top with eyes is the 'true Cairn' or if all 3 stones are part of the body and Cairn can just control its 3 disconnected body parts.

Bomber.Title: Bomber
Bomber.Description: The only thing more terrifying than the power of this living hazard's explosion is how clumsy it is.  Naturally, the latter will very often lead to the former coming to pass.  The process of natural selection dictates that if they want to have a tendency to play near cliffs, we should let them, but when they go down, they take a LOT with them.  Handle with care!

Hothead.Title: Hothead
Hothead.Description: Hothead is either cursed or blessed with one of the most self-explanatory names out there.  He's a head that is hot.  It might seem like he'd resent Burning Leo over the latter's notoriety since he's been around a bit longer, but he's actually stoked that fire-breathing has become a notable profession.  Rather than stew over being overshadowed, he'll take any hot tips from Leo that he can get.

Yolky.Title: Yolky
Yolky.Description: Another resident deep within Egg Garden's caves, Yolky doesn't bother herself with moving, she seems content with simply shooting globs of yolk everywhere and hoping that one day it hits somebody. On weekends, she'll offer to make runny yolk omelets for anybody who cares enough to pay her any attention.

Pacloud.Title: Pacloud
Pacloud.Description: Nobody's been willing to get close enough to check whether this carnivorous creep is really made of clouds or not.  As a result, while their relationship to the antlion-esque Pacto is obvious, hence their name, their relationship to a certain cycloptic storm cloud is unknown.  May actually prefer veggies?...

Laser Ball.Title: Laser Ball
Laser Ball.Description: Not much to say on this one's morphology; it's a ball that shoots lasers.  The ability Kirby can copy from it has been known to vary, but even Laser Kirby's never been able to reflect his lasers off thin air like Laser Ball can.  This quality has made them a popular subject of scientific studies...

Bouncy Sis.Title: Bouncy Sis
Bouncy Sis.Description: Does every Bouncy Sis have a little Bouncy?  It's kind of hard to say...  But she's SOME Bouncy's big sister.  Bigger means bulkier, and a more elaborate fashion sense to boot!  It's a lot harder to inhale her than her little sister(s), so be careful!  Rumor has it that like Bouncy, Bouncy Sis has a rivalry...  with Bouncy!  She's jealous she can't jump as high, apparently...

Flamer.Title: Flamer
Flamer.Description: This cycloptic circumnavigator wants to travel around the world!  So he's going to literally travel around...  whatever he can.  His carefree attitude belies his worst habit; when he sees someone he deems interesting, he lines up with them and charges at breakneck speed!  And when it's flaming tackle time, who's gonna stop him?!

Chuckie.Title: Chuckie
Chuckie.Description: Now HERE we have a strange fella.  Chuckie seems to fancy himself a hide-and-seek pro, but nobody has the guts to tell him that living in a conspicuous box and popping out when people pass by is a terrible strategy.  Look at him, he's so happy, are you gonna break his heart?!  Just don't confuse him for his cousin Hurly.  He's sensitive about that.

Mystic Block.Title: Mystic Block
Mystic Block.Description: Through unorthodox means, Waddle Doos have been fusing into the many building blocks of Asteroid Fields. Despite such a bizarre transformation, they don't seem to mind, even adapting to their new lifestyle as...uh... blocks. They'll guard their territories with passion and shoot electric projectiles at you. Perhaps they see it as a sign of dominance over their peers.

Capsule J2.Title: Capsule J2
Capsule J2.Description: With the Capsule J3 model produced by HWC proving to be cost-ineffective, many end users have chosen to return to the tried-and-true, sleeker J2 model.  Luckily for all parties, the downgrade is fairly simple since the J3 just had extra parts grafted on.  Hm?  What do they think about this process?  None of them have mouths to complain...

Cerulean.Title: Cerulean
Cerulean.Description: A...  what IS this thing?  I have no idea what to make of this guy!  They're not even cerulean-colored...  Has anyone asked for their opinion on the matter?  Oh well, they don't seem too perturbed by this.  There they go, gliding as easygoing as ever.  Reportedly they've even been known to engage in friendly flights with Soarars.  How chill.

Mopoo.Title: Mopoo
Mopoo.Description: A smiling white...  sphere of something.  Nobody knows if it's made of snow or clouds, as it's been seen in both environments in seemingly infinite numbers.  A giant one was even known to exist above Shiver Star, mistaken by some amateur observers for something much more sinister...  Mopoo's pretty much the opposite of sinister.

Golem.Title: Golem
Golem.Description: A great stone warrior of many techniques.  They hail from a distant world connected to Planet Popstar via the sky, and were brought into the world by and to serve their King.  They now roam masterless...  While you'd think this would make them open to being a bit friendlier, their heart remains as immovable as the stone composing their body.

Yellow.Title: Yellow
Yellow.Description: Yellow like a lemon, very sour!

Red.Title: Red
Red.Description: Reminiscent of a ripe strawberry, yum!

Yolk Temple.Title: Yolk Temple
Yolk Temple.Description: Colors of the thriving egg planet!

Blurple.Title: Blurple
Blurple.Description: Discord's signature mix of blue and purple.

Beam.Title: Beam
Beam.Description: Bright orange of a beam whip!

Stone.Title: Stone
Stone.Description: You're gonna need a shower after getting covered in dirt!

Royal Yarn.Title: Royal Yarn
Royal Yarn.Description: Prince Fluff's default, It feels like pants!

Gamble.Description: Kirby's mysterious companion! He wants to help stop the coming threat.

Happy Pea.Title: Happy Pea
Happy Pea.Description: A plant has come to help?! He can keep foes away from Kirby!

Epic Jar.Title: Epic Jar
Epic Jar.Description: This scientist brings his inventions to help blow up nearby foes!

Krackle.Title: Krackle
Krackle.Description: This little cloud wants to help pursue the violet menace!

Unlock Methods.Beam Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Beam Ability Challenge
Unlock Methods.Stone Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Stone Ability Challenge
Unlock Methods.Mirror Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Mirror Ability Challenge
Unlock Methods.Ninja Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Ninja Ability Challenge
Unlock Methods.Fire Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Fire Ability Challenge
Unlock Methods.Ice Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Ice Ability Challenge
Unlock Methods.Spark Gold Medal: Get a Gold Medal on Spark Ability Challenge

Beat Yolk Yard.Title: Crowned Vineyard
Beat Yolk Yard.Description: Found a way inside the mysterious temple.

Beat Grand Temple Avgo.Title: The Temple Stirs
Beat Grand Temple Avgo.Description: Found where Lor Starcutter has landed.

Complete Grand Temple Avgo.Title: Grand Temple Avgo Master
Complete Grand Temple Avgo.Description: Collected everything in Grand Temple Avgo.

Complete Floral Yolk Caves.Title: Floral Yolk Caves Master
Complete Floral Yolk Caves.Description: Collected everything in Floral Yolk Caves.

Beat Storm the Fortress.Title: True Lightyears
Beat Storm the Fortress.Description: Infiltrated the Fluxbender's base of operations.

Complete Storm the Fortress.Title: Storm the Fortress Master
Complete Storm the Fortress.Description: Collected everything in Storm the Fortress.

Beat Central Lab.Title: Slice and Dice
Beat Central Lab.Description: Cut our way through a roboboss.

Beat Path to the Nasty Machine.Title: Infraflux
Beat Path to the Nasty Machine.Description: Found the source of Gear Cube's power.

Complete Path to the Nasty Machine.Title: Path to the Nasty Machine Master
Complete Path to the Nasty Machine.Description: Collected everything in Path to the Nasty Machine.

Beat Up The Straw.Title: Ideal Transportation
Beat Up The Straw.Description: Found a way into Aquatia's core

Complete Up The Straw.Title: Up The Straw Master
Complete Up The Straw.Description: Collected everything in Up The Straw.

Beat Sacred Aquatia.Title: Open Sesame
Beat Sacred Aquatia.Description: Passed the trials of Aquatia's paradise.

Beat Cosmic Palace.Title: Final Weapon
Beat Cosmic Palace.Description: Acquired the weapon to kill deities.

Complete Chapter 1.Title: Lunar Master
Complete Chapter 1.Unlock Method: Collect everything in the first Chapter.

Master Cutter Ability.Title: Master Cutter Ability
Master Cutter Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Cutter Ability.

Master Beam Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Beam Ability.

Master Mystic Beam Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Mystic Beam Ability.

Master Stone Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Stone Ability.

Master Ufo Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Ufo Ability.

Master Bomb Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Bomb Ability.

Master Fire Ability.Title: Master Fire Ability

Master Mystic Fire Ability.Title: Master Mystic Fire Ability
Master Mystic Fire Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Mystic Fire Ability.

Master Spark Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Spark Ability.

Master Yoyo Ability.Title: Master Yoyo Ability
Master Yoyo Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Yoyo Ability.

Master Wheel Ability.Title: Master Wheel Ability
Master Wheel Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Wheel Ability.

Master Artist Ability.Title: Master Artist Ability
Master Artist Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Artist Ability.

Master Fighter Ability.Title: Master Fighter Ability
Master Fighter Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Fighter Ability.

Master Suplex Ability.Title: Master Suplex Ability
Master Suplex Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Suplex Ability.

Master Wing Ability.Title: Master Wing Ability
Master Wing Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Wing Ability.

Master Jet Ability.Title: Master Jet Ability
Master Jet Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Jet Ability.

Master Sword Ability.Title: Master Sword Ability
Master Sword Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Sword Ability.

Master Parasol Ability.Title: Master Parasol Ability
Master Parasol Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Parasol Ability.

Master Hammer Ability.Title: Master Hammer Ability
Master Hammer Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Hammer Ability.

Master Bell Ability.Title: Master Bell Ability
Master Bell Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Bell Ability.

Master Water Ability.Title: Master Water Ability
Master Water Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Water Ability.

Master Hi-Jump Ability.Title: Master Hi-Jump Ability
Master Hi-Jump Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Hi-Jump Ability.

Master Gear Ability.Title: Master Gear Ability
Master Gear Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Gear Ability.

Master Sleep Ability.Title: Master Sleep Ability
Master Sleep Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Sleep Ability.

Master Scan Ability.Title: Master Scan Ability
Master Scan Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Scan Ability.

Master Crash Ability.Title: Master Crash Ability
Master Crash Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Crash Ability.

Master Mic Ability.Title: Master Mic Ability
Master Mic Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Mic Ability.

Master Chef Ability.Title: Master Chef Ability
Master Chef Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Chef Ability.

Master Ultra Sword Ability.Title: Master Ultra Sword Ability
Master Ultra Sword Ability.Unlock Method: Get a certain amount of kills with Ultra Sword Ability.

Lifeless.Title: Lifeless
Lifeless.Description: No need to worry, you can try again forever!

Gamer Boy.Title: Gamer Boy
Gamer Boy.Description: For the classic look you desire!

Eye Bleach.Title: Eye Bleach
Eye Bleach.Description: For the classic look you dread!

Propeller Wing.Title: Propeller Wing
Propeller Wing.Description: [Up + Attack] to execute a weaker Final Cutter!

First Time Entrance.1: Hey there! It's been a while since you were last on the Lor, huh? Well if you've got the cash, I have some stuff I'm selling!

Entrance.2: Good to see you in one piece.
Entrance.6: Looking a bit rough, pal, why not buy some food?

Entrance New Items.1: I found some crazy stuff in the cargo hold!
Entrance New Items.2: I took a trip to another dimension while you were out, and I found some things you might like!

Buy Dialogue.1: I see you eyeing my leftovers, those are for sale too!
Buy Dialogue.2: I've got all sorts of helpful stuff!
Buy Dialogue.3: I'm sure I've got something that you'll find useful!
Buy Dialogue.4: Feel free to look around and see what I've got.

Purchase Item.3: I could get the Lor a new coat of paint with this!
Purchase Item.4: This should keep the lights on!
Purchase Item.5: Finally, I can afford that hairbrush I wanted!

Not Enough Money.1: I know you saved me and all, but you still gotta pay!
Not Enough Money.3: I'm not here to negotiate prices.
Not Enough Money.4: You aren't trying to stiff your pal, are you?
Not Enough Money.5: Don't try to guilt trip me into giving you free stuff!

Talk Dialogue.1: I've got plenty of stories to tell!
Talk Dialogue.2: What do you want to know?

Talk Options.1: Why were you at Egg Garden?

Why Were You At Egg Garden.1: Well, I had decided I needed a bit of a break from running the amusement park back on Popstar.
Why Were You At Egg Garden.2: It's not easy running that place, you know!
Why Were You At Egg Garden.3: I brought a friend with me too, but I think he may have gotten caught up in the conflict with that shady man...

Are You Okay.1: Admittedly, I'm a bit shaken up from that encounter with that man.
Are You Okay.2: That magic he used on me, something about it isn't right.
Are You Okay.3: Glad you knocked some sense into me though! Who knows what would've happened if you didn't.

You Have Hair.1: Of course I do! I keep it under my hood since it gets in the way.
You Have Hair.2: I wouldn't want my gorgeous hair getting stuck while I'm repairing the Lor!

Treasure.2: Check the [Collections Menu] to track your collectibles and treasures!

Anti Float.2: I sense an airless space here.
Anti Float.3 - Default: I don't know if that would effect you or not, but just to be safe.
Anti Float.3 - Kirby: You may be unable to float if you enter that area. Have to rely on your jumping skills.
